articles.title: World Cup 2022: Morocco defeats Portugal to advance to semifinals - ABC News
articles.description: Morocco defeats another European soccer giant with a 1-0 win over Portugal to become the first African nation to advance to the semifinals of the World Cup.
articles.content:
Morocco has toppled another European soccer giant with a 1-0 win over Portugal to become the first African nation to advance to the semifinals of the World Cup.
